configuration.name: PASSWORD_EXPIRY_IN_DAYS
configuration.label: Password Expiry In Days
configuration.description: The number of days a password is valid before it is considered expired and must be reset.

configuration.name: ERROR_MESSAGE
configuration.label: Error Message
configuration.description: The error code/message returned to the client when they attempt to use an expired password.
configuration.default_value: Your password has expired.  Please reset it.
